definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="nRandom">nRandom</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:nRandom</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Gets a random number for the state blow.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Sets a random animation state.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" name="TEXT">normal</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_data_string_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:PrairieDog</field><field name="TEXT">standing</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
